name: The Fight
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Theresa Mulligan, Joe Kelly (executive story editor), Robia Rashid (story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: The guys get invited to fight alongside Doug the Bartender. However, the fight doesn't go exactly how they imagined it to.
